thread.title: Customer
thread.title_full: Mazuma Mobile Australia reviewed by Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text:
I rang up three times to ask questions, each time I was given, kindness, and helpfulness. my cheques arived so promptly. I went to my bank to make the deposit, and, shared my good experience with the bank teller, who then asked for your company's phone number.
Kind regards
From Mrs G Knowles
